name: Primrose Lake: Twists of Fate
description:
Jenny and Jessica are back along with the entire, quirky cast of characters from Welcome to Primrose Lake.

This time they’re joined by an haughty heiress, a stoic suit, and a questionable craftsman. Things may look okay on the surface, but Jake is perpetually worried, Doc Brown is in an uproar, and Jenny must finally decide what to do about her fiance. Does she stay in Primrose Lake or flee before it’s too late?

Cliff-hangers are resolved. Questions are finally answered like is there a Carlyle Curse and who is that pesky mystery guest who keeps threatening to murder everyone?

Now Free to Play!

Time-management games have never been so fun. Your favorite mountain town is taken to new heights with more levels, new features, and strategic choices. All wrapped up in a story that will keep you guessing, there’s no denying you want to lose yourself in Primrose Lake.

FEATURES:

· Three times the levels as the first game, with infinite levels so you can play as long as you want.

· Enjoy mind-bending minigames at the end of every Episode.

· Strategy at a tap! Upgrade your locations until you feel like a supercharged rockstar.

· Having trouble? There are a ton of power-ups to get you over the tough hurdles.

· Collect crowns, coins, stars and diamonds to customize your gameplay.

· Complete daily challenges for big rewards.

· Build up your achievements and cash in as you advance.

· Regular releases, so there’s always fun new locations to explore.

· Every location is a unique business, so every episode is like a brand new game.
